subject: Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Diamondbacks reliever Takashi Saito grew up in an area that was decimated by the 9.0-magnitude earthquake and tsunami that struck Japan last year.
snippet: Diamondbacks reliever Takashi Saito grew up in an area that was decimated by the 9.0-magnitude earthquake and tsunami that struck Japan last year.
